subject: Order SSN5693
description_text:
Hello there I order on January 3rd and have had no information about my
package being dispatched or tacking etc 7 days later? Please advise

Regards
 Ronan

conversations.body_text: Hi Ronan Hickey,  Due to the New Year holidays, a large number of orders and emails accumulated, which caused a delay in shipping. We are currently working overtime and processing orders in sequence, and we will handle your order as soon as possible. The stock will arrive at our German warehouse in the coming days, and once it is stocked, it can be shipped directly to Ireland.

Hello there is there any update on this order please?

On Sun, 11 Jan 2026, 4:57 am service@simsonn.com,

Hi Ronan Hickey,    We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible.  Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
